text:
1. Stop apache
2. Change WinXP time zone to GMT+2 Jerusalem
3. Restart Apache

The process hangs with message regarding error in libhttpd.dll or in
libapr-1.dll 

More information is in http://www.technologyquestions.com/technology/windows-xp/235968-apache-http-server-crashs-xp-sp3-time-zone-set-gmt-n.html
creator: almog@infoneto.co.il

text:
The following Microsoft patch for Windows XP (KB951072) seems to fix this issue:

http://support.microsoft.com/kb/953917
creator: cm@cmunt.demon.co.uk
wrowe@apache.org
text:
From the looks of the list of affected products, this does not appear to be
an Apache problem.  Marking FAQ for quick reference.
